item.title: DK MedCom HospitalNotification
item.description: - Created MedComHospitalNotificationLeavePeriodExtension - References MedComHospitalNotificationLeavePeriodExtension from MedComHospitalNotificationEncounter to support timestamps for a period of leave - Added description about timestamps for MedComHospitalNotificationEncounter - Updated description about timestamps on the homepage - Updated and added examples
item.dc:creator: MedCom

item.title: MedCom Terminology
item.description: Alligned the content of display values in the CodeSystem MedComMessagingActivityCodes and ValueSet MedComHospitalNotificationMessageActivityCodes.
item.dc:creator: MedCom

item.title: DK MedCom CareCommunication
item.description: - Communication.recipient may reference a MedComCoreCareTeam or MedComCorePractitionerRole - MedComCareCommunicationSenderExtension is added an allow reference to a MedComCoreCareTeam or MedComCorePractitionerRole - Communication.sender is no longer MS, Communication.extension.sender is MS - MedComCareCommunicationPayloadAuthorContactExtension is added and referenced from Communication.payload.extension.authorContact - MessageHeader.focus is changed from 1..1 to 1..2 - Constraint 1-13 applied to MedComCommunication and MedComCareCommunicationMessage are added or updated. - Examples and descriptions updated due to the above changes
item.dc:creator: MedCom

item.title: DK MedCom Core
item.description: - The profile MedComCoreCareTeam is added to describe careteams involved in patient care. - In MedComCorePractitionerRole profile is the element organization made MustSupport.
item.dc:creator: MedCom

item.title: MedCom Terminology
item.description: - Added the CodeSystem MedComCorePractitionerRolesAutorisationsregistret and MedComCorePractitionerRolesSKSadministrativ and the ValueSet MedComCorePractitionerRoles to describe the roles of a practitioner. - The ValueSet MedComCareCommunicationMessageActivityCodes was updated as the code 'carbon copy' was deprecated. - The ValueSet MedComCoreAttachmentMimeTypes was updated as the code 'tiff' was added - The CodeSystem MedComCareCommunicationCategoryCodes was updated as Danish translations were added
item.dc:creator: MedCom

item.title: DK MedCom Core
item.description: MedCom Core
item.dc:creator: MedCom

item.title: DK MedCom HospitalNotification
item.description: MedCom HospitalNotification
item.dc:creator: MedCom

item.title: MedCom Terminology
item.description: *General*: Moved all terminologies to this IG. MedComHospitalNotificationEncounterClassCode: Removed the code ‘other’ from the ValueSet. MedComMessagingActivityCodes: Changed code ‘acknowledgment’ to ‘acknowledgement’ and updated description. HospitalNotificationActivityCodes: Added a Danish description of the codes. Full Changelog: https://github.com/medcomdk/dk-medcom-terminology/commits/v.2.0.0-IG
item.dc:creator: MedCom

item.title: DK MedCom CareCommunication
item.description: MedCom CareCommunication
